tooltip.vfx.umbral_lens: Grants monochrome sight and banishes creeping dark.
tooltip.vfx.shadow_hand_relic: Summon a crushing hand of midnight to obliterate a foe.
tooltip.vfx.ball_of_shadow: Call forth a swirling eclipse that fades after 10 seconds.
tooltip.vfx.gravity_domain_talisman: Unleash a crushing field that slams nearby foes two blocks downward.
tooltip.vfx.singularity_core: Compress reality into a singularity that drags foes into oblivion.
tooltip.vfx.gravity_well_totem: Anchor a gravity well that reels enemies toward its heart before imploding.
tooltip.vfx.sphere_of_doom: Summon a delayed annihilation sphere that carves a path of devastation.
message.vfx.shadow_collector.failed: The shadows refuse to answer the call.
message.vfx.shadow_collector.return_all_: No wandering shadows were close enough to reclaim.
message.vfx.shadow_collector.limit: Only %s shadows can manifest beyond the darkness.
item.vfx.gravitational_step_charm.descri: Allows the wearer to reorient gravity at will. Walk on walls or ceilings as if they were solid ground.
